metadata.name: !!~External item descriptions
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/l9nbaxP.png[/img]
This mod displays detailed information about all items, trinkets, cards, runes and pills DIRECTLY onto your screen. Say goodbye to your browsertab with platinumgod open ;)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/P6a8043.png[/img] [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions]Any Problems or want to help? Visit this project on GitHub[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/QmqdAmr.png[/img] - [b]Compatible with Afterbirth+ and Repentance[/b] - Displays information for all Collectibles, Trinkets, golden Trinkets, Cards, Runes, Pills, Horsepills, and some Rooms - Displays [b]additional informations[/b] like Itemtype, Charges, Transformations, Spindown Dice Results or Bag of Crafting recepies - Display one of 4 different Indicators around the inspected item - Mod support for nearly all mods! - Easy to use API ([url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki]Documentation here[/url]) - A huge amount of custom options like: ---- Indicators ---- Font style ---- Language ---- and a lot of visual options! - [b]Press F2 to hide/show the descriptions![/b]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/PFTZnfC.png[/img] [h1]You can use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1603631350]'Mod config Menu'[/url] to customize this mod![/h1] or [b]Windows[/b] 1. With Repentance: steamapps\common\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\mods\external item descriptions_836319872\ 1. With AB+: ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\ 2. Open 'eid_config.lua' with any texteditor 3. Edit the Config 4. Save the file 5. Play the game
To reset the config to default delete all the 'save[NUMBER].dat' files from the following folder: 1. With Repentance: steamapps\common\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\data\external item descriptions\ 1. With AB+: ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\
[b]Linux / Ubuntu [/b] Same as aboth but the path is: /home/%YourUsernameHere%/.steam/steam/steamapps/workshop/content/250900/836319872
